name: Love Shot
description:
Play as badass trick-shoting cupid and make people fall in love by hitting multiple people with the same arrow! hit two or more people to make them fall in love and rack up points before the time limit. Be careful though, if you hit only one person their heart will break and you will lose a point.                                                   .

Shoot = LMouse (needs to be charged)            .                                                                                                  .

Aim = Mouse                                                                                                    .               

Move = WASD        .

points:                                                 .

people sitting on benches are worth on point, people walking are worth two and people running are worth three.  2x points for 3 people, 3x points for 4 people, etc. One bonus point for a bounce.

 Game made for GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours                                   .                                                       

                              .

                                                                                                     .

.
